sentences.sContent: They’re working overtime to get the job finished.
He’s been doing a lot of overtime recently.
Many employees work countless hours of unpaid overtime.
sentences.sCn: 许多员工无偿加班无数个小时。

sentences.sContent: Many of our offices will be working on overtime until the end of the year.
sentences.sCn: 我们的许多办事处都要加班到年底。

phrases.pCn: 加班加点工作，超时工作

trans.tranOther: time that you spend working in your job in addition to your normal working hours
